list.listitem: Christian Bunsen (librarian)(17701837), chief librarian of Gttingen and professor of modern philology, father of Robert Bunsen
Christian Charles Josias Bunsen(17911860), Prussian diplomat and scholar
Frances Bunsen(17911876), or Baroness Bunsen, Welsh painter and author, wife of Christian Charles Josias Bunsen

Robert Bunsen(18111899), German chemist, after whom is named:Bunsen burnerBunsen cellBunsen (crater)Bunsen crateron the moon10361 Bunsen, an asteroidBunsen ReactionTheBunsenKirchhoff Award, a German award for spectroscopy
Dr. Bunsen Honeydew, fictional character from the Muppet Show
